channel.title: [508] Npc Dialogue
channel.description:
OKay, so i want to make it so when you talk to NPC it goes like this...
Oh thank you, would you like these Strange Looking white things? "Click here to Continue"
"Yes" "No"
If click yes you get Bones.
If Click No the Npc just says " Okay, I'll have them so just ask me whenever."
Please help...thanks.

item.title: [508] Npc Dialogue
item.dc:creator: @i0wnuall i0wnuall

“Click here to Continue”
